quote.msg: you can do it
Love me or hate me I’m still gonna shine.
No matter what happens, i will never leave you alone
think twice before you act
Start doing what is necessary; then do what is possible; and suddenly you are doing the impossible
The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched, they must be felt with the heart
Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence
We know what we are, but we know not what we may be
Nothing is impossible. The word itself says I'm possible
I can't catch the direction of wind, but I can adjust my sails to reach my destination
Try to be a rainbow in someones cloud
Put your heart, mind and soul into even your smallest acts. This is the secret of success
Its during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the lights
Change your thoughts and you change the world
Believe you can and you're halfway there
If opportunity doesnt knock, build a door
We can't help everyone. But everyone can help someone
The measure of who we are is what we do with what we have
There are two ways of spreading lights; to be the candle or the mirror that reflects it
Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds you plant
Whoever is happy will make others happy too
Don't cry because it is over, smile because it happened
Be yourself, everyone else is already taken
Sometimes breakups aren’t meant for makeups, sometimes they are meant for wake-ups.
A room without books is like a body without soul
You know you are in love when you cant fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams
So many books, so little time
You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough
Be the change that you wish to see in the world
In three words, I can sumup everything that I learned about life: it goes on
No one can make you feel inferior without your consent
If you tell the truth, you dont have to remember everything
A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you
Always forgive your enemies, nothing annoys them so much
Live as if you were to die tomorrow; Learn as if you were to live forever
To live is the most difficult thing in the world. Most people exists, that is all
Without music, life would be a mistake
Insanity is the same thing doing over and over again, but expecting different results
Fortune favors the brave
You are good enough
Work so hard that one day your signature will be called an autograph
My memory loves you, it asks about you all the time
Honesty is the first chapter in the book of wisdom
If I only had one minute to live, I would spent all sixty seconds telling you how much I love you
Growing old is mandatory; Growing up is optional
Some days are just HARD
It feels good to be lost in the right direction
Never push a loyal person to a point where they no longer care
To us, family means putting your arms around each other and being there
Rejoice with your family in the beautiful land of life!
The family is a haven in a heartless world.
You Always Get Hurt The Moment You Begin To Care.
The most painful memory.. when I walked away and you let me go.
I feel so far away from the one I wish to hold in my arms :(
Its better to be lonely then to be played by wrong people.
I will never stop caring, but if you decide to push me away, I will go.
I like to listen to sad music when I'm sad to make me double sad.
People are lonely because they build walls instead of bridges..
Smile and no one will see how broken you are inside.
I’m missing something in my life these days.
Why does it always have to be the one that you love the most hits
loves when you listen to a song and it relates 100% sure to how you feel.
The truth hurts for a little while, but lies hurt for a lifetime.
I hate being broken. I hate that I cannot go back.
I don't usually sleep enough, but when I do, it's still not enough.
Love is beautiful mistake of my life.
Love is blind, Be careful.
Love Is My Favorite Mistake.
Love is game for liars and pain for shayars.
I may not be perfect, but I'm always me.
Trusting you again is my decision, Proving me wrong is your choice.
It’s hard to tell your mind to stop loving someone when your heart still does.
No more wasting time thinking about wasted time.
Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional.
When This Is Over, Remember, I didn’t WALK Away, You Pushed Me Away.
Isn’t it sad that you are hurt so much that finally you can say “I’m used to it”.
Time doen’t really Heal the heart.It just makes the heart forget all the pain.
You cannot protect yourself from sadness without protecting yourself from happiness.
A relationship is only made for two….but some just forget how to count.
If it’s not a happy ending then it’s not the ending at all.
How did we go from talking everyday to strangers?
Is finally driven to the point were they finds comfort in lies and shuns the truth.
life's so shit it makes wot comes out the dog's ass look good!
Why be mean to animals when they treat you better then people.
College has given me the confidence I need to fail.
Your ignorance makes me to love you more.
You treated me like an option so I left you like a choice.
I loved you from the bottom of my heart but you didn’t understand.
Love never fails, people fail on love.
I feel crappy inside, like something just broke.
How can I go back to where the smile i had was real.
I feel so far away from the one I wish to hold in my arms.
The higher you climb on love’s ladder, the harder you fall.
You know my name not my story.
My room is so quiet and empty, it hurts.
The funniest people are the saddest ones.
A feeling of sadness seemingly without a cause.
I did everything right for someone that does everything wrong.
I just need that one person who will stand by me no matter what.
The hardest thing to do is watch the person you love, love someone else.
Dear bad luck, let’s break up.
